Step 1: Shake of the vesicant about 20 times Step 2: Take off cap and screw the gun onto the valve of the can Step 3: Moisten the surface and then apply the foam evenly into the joint
How to clean the gun after each use?
1. Clean the exterior and gun tip 2. Take off cap and screw the gun onto the valve of the can 3. Then spray to flush the interior until foam gone
